notes: Fifth generation on GM Zeta platform (2010-2015). Reintroduced after 7-year hiatus. LS3 V8 in SS, supercharged LSA in ZL1. Z/28 track variant introduced 2014. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chevrolet Camaro article, January 2025 revision.
Third generation (2003-2006). Increased to 8.3L V10. Coupe introduced 2006. First Viper badged as SRT. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Viper article, January 2025 revision.
Fourth generation (2008-2010). Increased to 8.4L V10, 600 hp. Final year before hiatus. ACR track variant available. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Viper article, January 2025 revision.
